name: The Lost Alignment
description:
This a project from USC game CTIN 532 Fall2021's class.

It's a 3d puzzle adventure game happened in a paranormal museum.

The story is about a lost gem and a notorious thief.

It's a small prototype about some of our ideas. If you are interested, please leave some comments and suggests. We would take your advice and develope a better version in the future.

Developer: Trenten Kaufeldt-Lira & Weijie Xu

Audio: Sean Delvin & Jennie Han

Also thanks to our professor, classmates  and all the palytesters.
